question: Who won the 67th edition of the Miss World crown?
explanation: India's Manushi Chhillar won the 67th edition of the Miss World pageant which was held on 18 November 2017 at the Sanya City Arena in Sanya, China. Around 108 women from across the world participated in the beauty pageant. Andrea Meza, who is Miss Mexico was the first runner up and Stephanie Hill from England was second runner up. She is the sixth Indian woman to win the coveted title of Miss World.
